column4: hello i would like to install ubuntu along side windows but would like to keep 250 gigs of my 300 gigs on my windows side can i store all of my files on my windows side and just use everything from there ?
you can use the files on your windows partition from ubuntu
like music/pictures/etc + you can't run the programs like on windows though
but ryhtmbox will work just fine with the stuff and same with movies
